messages.name: Wesley
messages.text: Hi Heather, there is a few things I can help with. Save money by moving your balances. Grow your super in a tax effective way. Protect you and your family by looking at your insurance cover.

messages.name: Wesley
messages.text: Would you like me to explore these further?

messages.name: Wesley
messages.text: Firstly, to save, shift money from your offset account to your personal loan. This could save you $54 a week.

messages.name: Wesley
messages.text: Would you like to set this up?.

messages.name: Wesley
messages.text: Secondly, to grow your retirement savings and make the most of your pre-taxed earnings, salary sacrifice $50 a week into your super. That could make a difference of $50,000 by the time you retire.

messages.name: Heather
messages.text: OK. What would happen if I sacrificed $100 per week to super?

messages.name: Wesley
messages.text: Sure, I'll let your employer know you want to set that up.

messages.name: Heather
messages.text: Sorry, Wesley - the kids just got home from school. Can we talk about the rest later?

messages.name: Wesley
messages.text: No worries. I'll talk to you about in three days. Is that OK?
